Post.title: QANet
Post._content:
## QANet
#### QANet: Combining Local Convolution with Global Self-Attention for Reading Comprehension


### 
1. RNN
2. 
3. 

### 
<!--more-->
![image](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpc8wjfzj30rk0zw43g.jpg)
1. Embedding
2. Embedding Encoder
3. Context-Query Attention
4. Model encoder
5. Output

#### Embedding

600
- 
    > 300Glove
    > embedding$600\times300$
- 
    > padding16
    > 200 embedding$600\times16\times200$
    > filter=128,kernel=5 ($600\times12\times128$)
    > $600\times128$
    
- Highway Network$600\times328$

#### Embedding Encoder
Contextquery
EncoderSelf-Attention
d=328d=128.
![image](https://ws2.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpsx6edxj30k80xsmzy.jpg)
**1. Position encoding**
AttentionK,VAttentionAttentionPosition Embedding

$PE_{(pos,2i)}=sin(pos/10000^{2i/d_{model}})$
$PE_{(pos,2i+1)}=cos(pos/10000^{2i/d_{model}})$
pos(i+k)pos(i)
position embedding

**2. **

feature mapconcat$1 \times 1$
![image](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpu79woaj310a0huq5v.jpg)
![image](https://ws2.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpulkoc4j30uy06gwfs.jpg)

Xception


3$3\times3$133feature map256$1 \times 1$33feature map3

**3. **
[Attention is All You Need](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1706.03762.pdf)
RNNRNNCNNAttention
![image](https://ws2.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpvist54j30og0ss0uz.jpg)
$Attention(\boldsymbol{Q},\boldsymbol{K},\boldsymbol{V}) = softmax\left(\frac{\boldsymbol{Q}\boldsymbol{K}^{\top}}{\sqrt{d_k}}\right)\boldsymbol{V}$
querykeysoftmax,queryvalue

**Self Attention**

Q=K=VSelf AttentionAttention

**Muilti-Head Attention**

GoogleAttentionQ,K,VAttentionh
![image](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpwc63ldj30hc0kkq4k.jpg)

Multi-Head
attentionQKV

**4. +**

encoder blocklayernorm
$Output = f(layernorm(x)) + x$
 f encoder block  depth conv, self-attention, feed-forwardlayernorm()  layer normalization

![image](https://ws3.sinaimg.cn/large/006tNc79ly1fvrpwq23s1j314m0cs0up.jpg)
BNminibatchXcase

LN: BNminibatchLNmini-batchsequence


#### Context-Query Attention Layer
context query query, context
1. contextquerySBiDAF
$S_{i,j} = f(q,c ) = W_0[q,c,q\odot c]$
2. context-to-queryattention A
$A = softmax(S, axis=row) \cdot Q^T \quad \in R^{n\times d}$

> context600question100embedding encoder$S=600\times128$$Q=100\times128$$S\cdot Q^T$$600\times100$

> contextwqueryw
> $A$Qw
> querycontext
3. query-to-contextattention B
$B = A\cdot softmax(S,axis=column)^T \cdot C^T$
(DCNcoattention) [Dynamic Coattention Networks For Question Answering](https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.01604)
#### Model Encoder layer
contextquery
3Context
Context$C \in \mathcal{R}^{n\times d}$
ContextAttention: $A \in \mathcal{R}^{n\times d}$
ContextCoattention:$B \in \mathcal{R}^{n \times d}$ 

$f(w) = [c, a, c \odot a, c \odot b]$
7Encoder-BlockEncoder-Block2Self-AttentionFFNEmbedding Encoder
3Model-Encoder$M_0,M_1,M_2$.

#### Output layer
answercontext
$pos^{start} = softmax(W_{start} [M_0; M_1]),\quad  pos^{end} = softmax(W_{end}[M_0; M_2])$

#### Loss function
$L(\theta) = -  \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i}^N\left[\log(p_{y_i^{start}}^{start}) + \log(p_{y_i^{end}}^{end})\right]$

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

title: Hello World

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
